title: Unknowingly, British Farmer Uses Priceless Dagger As Doorstop
teaser: A farmer in Rudham, England, has $65,000 to put toward a new doorstop because his current one was bought by a museum. It turns out the metal object he found was a 3,500-year-old dagger.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
